name: GoEuro Travel GmbH
membership: As a Travel Agency in France, it is mandatory to become a member of EDV - les Entreprises de Voyage - http://www.entreprisesduvoyage.org/
goal: Omio is a multi-modal travel search engine providing customers with clear visibility over transportation options for journeys across Europe. We provide impartial access to booking capability for around 800 transportation providers from rail, coach and airline segments.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention, Transport
euInitiatives:
Rail Passenger Rights
Multi-modal passenger rights
PSI Directive
CRS Consultation
